item.description: GoToSocial, Misskey, Sharkey, Hollo, Iceshrimp, Pleroma, the list goes on. So which one is the best at being lightweight but feature complete?

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldggnn2elc2s
item.description: A lot of #Mastodon users hating on #Bluesky, primarily because of its centralized nature. I wonder if these same users realize how much they are relying on their Mastodon instance administrotor (e.g. mastodon.social) instead of bsky.social.
item.content:encoded: A lot of #Mastodon users hating on #Bluesky, primarily because of its centralized nature. I wonder if these same users realize how much they are relying on their Mastodon instance administrotor (e.g. mastodon.social) instead of bsky.social.
